titleStmt.title: A brief charactor of the antient Christian Quakers Written by W.M. A witness for the truth, as it was in the begining.
titleStmt.author: Mather, W. (William), fl. 1695.
Crook, John, 1617-1699.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for S. Clarke in George-Yard in Lombard-Street,

notesStmt.note: Signed at foot of p. 6: By John Crook; Smith -- "It is to be noted, that ... an extract is made to serve the turn from John Crook, ...".
Reproduction of the original in the Friends' House Library, London.
